verbose_text: Splenocytes from CFP treated and control mice were seeded in 24-well tissue culture plates at 1x10 6 cells / well in 500 muL of RPMI-1640 (supplemented with 10% heat inactivated FCS, 25 mM HEPES, 2 mM l-glutamine, 1 mM sodium pyruvate, 100 IU/mL penicillin and 100 mug/mL streptomycin) in the presence or absence of CFP exosomes, UT exosomes and CFP at different concentrations for 72 h. Phytohemagglutinin (PHA) (5 mug/mL) was used as a positive control for cell viability.
evidence: heat-inactivated FCS, 25 mM HEPES, 2 mM l-glutamine
